snippet.title: Classic Game Room - COMBAT review for Atari 2600
snippet.description:
Combat review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Shop CGR shirts & hats! http://www.CGRstore.com
Classic Game Room season 1 - 1/20/2000

If you look up the word "Old School" in the dictionary you'll see a picture of this game. It was made for the legendary Atari 2600 in 1978, way before such things as motorized horseless carriages, World War I and light beer.  It was probably made before your parents even met.

Game Room reviewed Atari, NES, Nintendo, Sega Genesis, Dreamcast and Playstation... too bad they didn't get to Xbox 360, PS3, PS2 or Wii.
